llama2_direct_sole-planning_results:
Great! Based on your requirements, I can provide you with a 7-day travel plan for your group of 8 travelers from Chicago to Idaho from March 25th to March 31st, 2022.

Day 1 - March 25th: Chicago to Boise

* Flight from Chicago to Boise (Flight Number F3857813)
	+ Departure time: 9:48 AM
	+ Arrival time: 12:51 PM
	+ Distance: 1,437 km
	+ Estimated flight duration: 4 hours 3 minutes

Day 2 - March 26th: Boise

* Self-driving from Boise to Pocatello (distance: 378 km, duration: 5 hours)
* Visit the Idaho Falls and enjoy the scenic views (distance: 83.6 km, duration: 1 hour 23 minutes)

Day 3 - March 27th: Pocatello to Idaho Falls

* Self-driving from Pocatello to Idaho Falls (distance: 83.6 km, duration: 51 minutes)
* Visit the Idaho Falls and enjoy the scenic views (duration: 1 hour 23 minutes)

Day 4 - March 28th: Idaho Falls

* Visit the Idaho Falls and enjoy the scenic views (duration: 2 hours 37 minutes)
* Self-driving to Craters of the Moon National Monument (distance: 160.5 km, duration: 2 hours 29 minutes)

Day 5 - March 29th: Craters of the Moon National Monument

* Visit the Craters of the Moon National Monument and enjoy the scenic views (duration: 4 hours 37 minutes)
* Self-driving to Boise (distance: 268.1 km, duration: 4 hours 29 minutes)

Day 6 - March 30th: Boise

* Visit the Boise River and enjoy the scenic views (duration: 2 hours 37 minutes)
* Self-driving to Pocatello (distance: 158.4 km, duration: 2 hours 29 minutes)

Day 7 - March 31st: Pocatello

* Visit the Pocatello Zoo and enjoy the animal exhibits (duration: 2 hours 37 minutes)
* Self-driving back to Chicago (distance: 1,437 km, duration: 4 hours 3 minutes)

Budget Breakdown:

* Flights: $150 x 8 passengers = $1,200
* Self-driving: $60 x 8 passengers = $480
* Total budget: $1,680

Note: The above itinerary and budget are based on the information provided in your query. Please let me know if you need any changes or updates.
